_inspectorSnowReport.Report: More snow is on the way! We are expecting 2 to 5 inches of snow during the day today and another storm is forecast for this weekend. Fingers crossed for lots of fluff.  We are spinning Link chairlift and Moonbeam Express from 9:00 a.m. 4:00 p.m. daily, providing access to Same Street, lower Little Dollie, and Easy Street with three terrain park features. Early season conditions exist. Stay on trail, check your speed, and respect all closures. Black Friday deals are still live until this Sunday and you wont want to miss out on these great deals: Ticket Paks, Friends & Family Tickets, Rentals, Nordic Center Season Passes, and more.
